Translations.Text: nanu avanannu sajjugolisi avanalli nanna atmavannu udidaga nivu avanige sastangaveragiri
adare iblisana horatu. Avanu, sastanga veragidavara jote seralu nirakarisidanu
avanu (allahanu) kelidanu; o iblis, nineke sastangaveragidavara jote seralilla
avanu (iblis) helidanu; ninu avemannina onagareyinda srstisiruva manavanige sastanga veraguvavanu nanalla
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; ninu illinda tolagu. Khanditavagiyu ninu sapitanu
antima vicaraneya dinadavaregu ninna mele sapaviruvudu
avanu helidanu; ‘‘nannodeya, (ella nirjivigalannu) jivantagolisalaguva dinada tanaka nanage kalavakasavannu nidu.’’
Avanu (allahanu) helidanu; ido, ninage kalavakasa nidalagide
avanu (iblis) helidanu; nannodeya, ninu nannannu dari tappisiruvudarinda nanu (tappu dariyannu) bhumiyalliruvavarige candaganisuvenu mattu avarellarannu daritappisi biduvenu
avara paiki ninna ayda dasara horatu
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; idu nanna kadegiruva nera marga
khanditavagiyu a nanna dasara mele ninna adhikaravenu nadeyadu – ninnannu anusarisida darigedigala horatu
khanditavagiyu, narakave avarellarige vagdana madalada neleyagide
adakke elu bagilugaliruvavu. Pratiyondu bagiligu avarallina ondu palu nigaditavagide
dharmanistharu khandita totagalalli hagu jharigalalli iruvaru
‘‘Santiyondige hagu suraksitaragi ivugalolage pravesisiri’’ (ennutta avarannu svagatisalaguvudu)
avara edegalalli ulididda vaisamyavannella navu kittesedevu – avaru sahodararagi asanagalalli eduru baduragi kulitiruvaru
